Installation.body:
---
title: Installation
---

So, let's get started...

# Installing with NPM
```
npm install rxn-input
```

# Installing with Yarn
```
yarn add rxn-input
```

### After that, we need to setup the dependencies to use the project on [Android](docs/getting-started/setup-android).
